title: U.S. consumer perception of Amazon as a company 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response I like using Amazon and lowest at Response None of the above.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 55.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
The maximum Share of respondents 67.0 is found at Response I like using Amazon and the minimum is found at None of the above where Response is 12.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 10 number of Responses.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response I like using Amazon and lowest at Response None of the above.
The difference of Share of respondents between the highest and lowest Response is 55.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Response I like using Amazon and lowest at Response None of the above.
Response With Amazon I get what I need has the second highest value for Share of respondents.
The highest Response I like using Amazon has 55.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Response None of the above.

The Response I like using Amazon has the highest Share of respondents, followed by With Amazon I get what I need, and I trust Amazon with my payment information. Down to the Response None of the above which is the lowest.
Response Amazon is an integral part of my life, and Amazon respects my privacy share the same value 32.0.
The Response I like using Amazon has 1.81 times more Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 371.0 if we add up values of all Responses.

data.Response: With Amazon I get what I need
I trust Amazon with my payment information
Amazon takes the interests of its customers seriously
Amazon assumes a pioneering role in this day and age
Amazon is an integral part of my life
I would like to see more products and services from Amazon
There are no alternatives to Amazon
